CustomField.formula:
"Customer Number: " + customer_number__c + BR() + IF(ISPICKVAL(Customer_Segmentation__c , "HIGH_TOUCH"), "Segment: High Touch" + BR(), IF(ISPICKVAL(Customer_Segmentation__c , "MID_TOUCH"), "Segment: Mid Touch" + BR(), IF(ISPICKVAL(Customer_Segmentation__c , "TECH_TOUCH"), "Segment: Tech Touch" + BR(),""))) + "Country: " + ShippingCountry + BR() + "Number of Customer Shops: " + TEXT(Number_of_Customer_Shops__c) + BR() + IF(zz_turnover_customer__c = 1, "Turnover Customer", "") + "Total Number of Potential Shop Domain: " +TEXT(Total_Number_Of_Potential_ShopDomain__c) + BR() + "Number of New Potential Shop Domain: " +TEXT(Number_Of_New_Potential_ShopDomain__c) + BR()
/* + IF( Min_HealthScore__c>0, "HealthScore of healthiest shop: " + TEXT(ROUND(Min_HealthScore__c,2)),"") CJA: Commented out on 18.09.2020, until we decide how to proceed with the HealthScore in 10.2020/11.2020 */
CustomField.label: Account Info
